pages.title: Harvesting Spawners
pages.text: The $(l:enchanting/resonance)Resonance$(/l) enchantment enables you to get Spawners to drop, to be collected by you.$(br2)While you haven't yet figured out how to make these constructs yourself, you now feel more than capable of changing their properties in your favor, using the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l).

pages.title: Changing Creature
pages.text: Using a similar technique to $(l:creating_life/memory)remembering Memories$(/l) you can change the Spawners creature association, making it spew out another type of creature alltogether.

pages.title: Spawn Delay
pages.text: Lowers both min and max spawn delay.

pages.title: Spawn Count
pages.text: Increases the count of Creatures summoned with each cycle.

pages.title: Summoning Criteria
pages.text: Increases the number of creatures allowed to be close to the spawner.$(br)$(italic)Spawners seem to naturally stop spawning creatures when there are a lot of them close-by already. Almost like they want to give you a chance. Pathetic, isn't it? As if you would need that.

pages.title: Activation Range
pages.text: Increases the range you can stand for the spawner to still spawn creatures.
